reviews.title: Hidden extra cost
reviews.content: While the device is super good, when you buy it from this seller, you will have to spend an extra Ksh 800 for the charger header. Whenever you see some discount, beware that you will still spend more to power your device. If the selling price is Ksh 12,900 at Jumia, rest assured that by the end of the day you will have spent approximately 13700. In real sense, the discount you see is a lie.

reviews.title: l like it and l dont like it
reviews.content: The earbuds are really nice. the sounds are good the bass is punchy and smooth to hear. my only issue is; its not refined to use on calls and also connectivity. the touch sensors are not really good you might be trying to adjust the buds on your hear and boom you've turned it off and also some times you might put it on pod and it doesn't turn off remains connected. But the solution is you reset it and download its app (scan the QR code on the manual)  configure the gesture settings and it will be easy to live with it. but its value for money it strikes the balance between the price and what it offers.
